string-array.name: country_descrip
string-array.item: Officially the Islamic Emirate of Afghanistan, is a landlocked country located at the crossroads of Central Asia and South Asia./n Capital: Kabul CO2 emissions per capita: 0.16 metric tons (2019) World Bank Fertility rate: 4.75 births per woman (2020) World Bank GDP growth rate: -20.7% annual change (2021) World Bank Gross domestic product: 14.79 billion USD (2021) World Bank GDP per capita: 368.75 USD (2021) World Bank Gross national income: 67.36 billion PPP dollars (2021) World Bank
